Name: Ai-(Onic)
About the game: Challenge your friends to fight you on a foreign planet as small robots tanks. In this high paced sci-fi game you will experience building cover in order to protect your base and fighting your enemies until destruction. While everything seems reasonable at first, don't be surprised if everything is chaos at the end of the game. Main Features Multiplayer 2-8 players. Upgrade all your weapons. Upgrade your characters movement. Customize your character look. Add cosmetics to your character. Deform the terrain however you want
